#include "commo.h"
#include "../rcc/graph.h"
#include "../rcc/graph_marshaler.h"
#include "../command.h"
#include "../procedure.h"
#include "../command_marshaler.h"
#include "raft_rpc.h"
#include "macros.h"

namespace janus {



RaftCommo::RaftCommo(PollMgr* poll) : Communicator(poll) {
}


shared_ptr<IntEvent> 
RaftCommo::SendRequestVote(parid_t par_id,
                          siteid_t site_id,
                          const int64_t& candidateTerm,
                          const uint64_t& candidateId,
                          const int64_t& candidateLastLogIndex,
                          const int64_t& candidateLastLogTerm,
                          uint64_t* replyId, 
                          int64_t* replyTerm, 
                          bool_t* replyGranted) {
  /*
   * Example code for sending a single RPC to server at site_id
   * You may modify and use this function or just use it as a reference
   */
  auto proxies = rpc_par_proxies_[par_id];
  auto ev = Reactor::CreateSpEvent<IntEvent>();
  for (auto& p : proxies) {
    if (p.first == site_id) {
      RaftProxy *proxy = (RaftProxy*) p.second;
      FutureAttr fuattr;
      fuattr.callback = [ev, replyId, replyTerm, replyGranted](Future* fu) {
        /* this is a handler that will be invoked when the RPC returns */
        /* retrieve RPC return values in order */


        fu->get_reply() >> *replyId;
        fu->get_reply() >> *replyTerm;
        fu->get_reply() >> *replyGranted;
        ev->Set(1);
        /* process the RPC response here */

      };
      /* Always use Call_Async(proxy, RPC name, RPC args..., fuattr)
      * to asynchronously invoke RPCs */
      Call_Async(proxy, RequestVote, candidateTerm, candidateId, candidateLastLogIndex, candidateLastLogTerm, fuattr);
    }
  }
  return ev;
}


shared_ptr<IntEvent> 
RaftCommo::SendAppendEntries(parid_t par_id,
                            siteid_t site_id,
                            const uint64_t& leaderId,
                            const int64_t& leaderTerm,
                            const int64_t& prevLogIndex,
                            const int64_t& prevLogTerm,
                            const int32_t& cmdType,
                            const vector<std::string>& sendLog,


                            const uint64_t& leaderCommit,
                            int64_t* replyTerm,
                            bool_t* replySuccess,
                            int64_t* replyConflictTerm,
                            int64_t* replyConflictIndex) {
  /*
   * More example code for sending a single RPC to server at site_id
   * You may modify and use this function or just use it as a reference
   */
  auto proxies = rpc_par_proxies_[par_id];
  auto ev = Reactor::CreateSpEvent<IntEvent>();
  for (auto& p : proxies) {
    if (p.first == site_id) {
      RaftProxy *proxy = (RaftProxy*) p.second;
      FutureAttr fuattr;
      fuattr.callback = [ev, replyTerm, replySuccess, replyConflictTerm, replyConflictIndex](Future* fu) {
        fu->get_reply() >> *replyTerm;
        fu->get_reply() >> *replySuccess;
        fu->get_reply() >> *replyConflictTerm;


        fu->get_reply() >> *replyConflictIndex;
        ev->Set(1);
      };
      /* wrap Marshallable in a MarshallDeputy to send over RPC */
      Call_Async(proxy, AppendEntries, leaderId, leaderTerm, prevLogIndex, prevLogTerm, cmdType, sendLog, leaderCommit, fuattr);
    }
  }
  return ev;
}


shared_ptr<IntEvent> 
RaftCommo::SendString(parid_t par_id, siteid_t site_id, const int64_t& term, const string& msg, string* res) {
  auto proxies = rpc_par_proxies_[par_id];
  auto ev = Reactor::CreateSpEvent<IntEvent>();
  for (auto& p : proxies) {
    if (p.first == site_id) {
      RaftProxy *proxy = (RaftProxy*) p.second;
      FutureAttr fuattr;
      fuattr.callback = [res,ev](Future* fu) {
        fu->get_reply() >> *res;
        ev->Set(1);
      };
      /* wrap Marshallable in a MarshallDeputy to send over RPC */
      Call_Async(proxy, HelloRpc, term, msg, fuattr);
    }
  }
  return ev;
}
} // namespace janus
